blocks.text: 1. Show how to analyse approximately the displacement of a point in a mechanism on the assumption that it may be represented by a limited series of sine and cosine terms, and obtain general expressions for the values of the constants in the series.

Let $x$ and $y$ be the angular displacement of an actuating crank and its corresponding uniformly varying mechanism. Apply your results to obtain the values of the angular displacement $A$ of a point in a mechanism for the corresponding angular displacement of a uniformly revolving crank.

blocks.description: Angular displacement in relation to crank angle and constants.
